#text=Last week , I decided that I wanted to try a new hairstyle and decided to get a haircut .
#text=I called my salon and made an appointment for Monday .
#text=My salon is one of several stores in the Chicago area .
#text=It is located in a busy shopping area and has a modern and edgy feel .
#text=Before going to the salon , I found a couple pictures online of haircuts that I liked .
#text=I saved them on my iPhone to show my stylist .
#text=I drove to the salon and went inside .
#text=My stylist greeted me and took me to her chair .
#text=We talked about the type of haircut I wanted , and I showed her the pictures on my phone .
#text=She then took me to get my hair washed .
#text=She put a cape around my neck .
#text=She sectioned off pieces of my hair and began cutting it .
#text=Once my haircut was finished , she used a blowdryer and a curling iron to style my hair .
#text=I paid the bill and left my stylist a tip .
#text=I will go back to the salon in three months .
